definition: the hundreds place (or column) in the decimal system
surname Bai
hundred/numerous/all kinds of
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: Hundreds of students took to the streets to protest against the fare of their annual bus passes.
sentences.chinese: 上百位学生走上街头抗议他们的公车年票费用。

sentences.english: In response to that decision, hundreds of 8)academics wrote protest letters.
sentences.chinese: 为了回应这项决定，几百位学术界人士发出了抗议信。

sentences.english: Famous speechmaker will attend height forum and thematic forum inside nearly 100 course of study.
sentences.chinese: 近百位业内知名演讲人将参加高峰论坛和主题论坛。

sentences.english: Before long, the one-hundredth prince gained the respect and affection of all.
sentences.chinese: 没过多久，第一百位王子就得到所有人的尊敬和爱戴。

sentences.english: The first ceremony of the "Life Long Fund for one hundred elder".
sentences.chinese: 瞿建国会长在“百位老人终身津贴”首发仪式上。

sentences.english: When I shot it, hundreds of small people fell to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 当我开枪时，有数百位小人扑倒在地上。

sentences.english: Hundreds of enthusiasts wearing goggles catch a glimpse of the phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 数百位热情人士戴著护目镜捕捉日食现象的惊鸿一瞥。

sentences.english: Hundreds of students took to the streets protesting against the fares of their annual bus passes.
sentences.chinese: 上百位学生走上街道抗议公车年票的费用。

sentences.english: Hundreds of commuters are squashed into the train.
sentences.chinese: 数百位通勤者拥进了火车。

sentences.english: The school guesthouse receives one hundred guests everyday.
sentences.chinese: 学校招待所每天接待一百位客人。

sentences.english: The next day Isat down , with almost a hundred other candidates for the intelligence test .
sentences.chinese: 第二天我与其他将近一百位面试者坐着等待智力测验。

sentences.english: About 100 famous actors worked for nothing on “The Founding of a Republic”.
sentences.chinese: 在《建国大业》中，约有一百位知名演员无偿出演。

sentences.english: One hundred carefully screened people were invited to have dinner with me.
sentences.chinese: 一百位经过仔细筛选的人获邀与我共进晚餐。
